description: This file contains utility functions for reading properties from files, reading file content, checking if a path is a regular file, searching files recursively with patterns, and expanding variables within strings based on property values. It provides foundational support for file processing and configuration management within a larger project.

methods.name: bool readPropertyFromFile(const char * filename,const string & property,string & propertyValue)
methods.description: Reads the value of a specified property from a given file, supporting recursive expansion if the property value starts with '$'.

methods.name: bool readFileContent(const char * filename,string & content)
methods.description: Reads the entire content of a file into a string.

methods.name: bool isRegularFile(const string & path)
methods.description: Checks if a given path corresponds to a regular file.

methods.name: bool searchFiles(string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Recursively searches for files matching patterns within directories, with support for depth limits and exclusions.

methods.name: bool ExpandPropertiesInString(const char * input,const char * filePath,string & expandedString)
methods.description: Replaces variables in a string with their corresponding property values from a specified file.

methods.name: bool searchFilesRec(std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
